attributes.action: Give the power back to HM Queen Elizabeth II
attributes.additional_details: If you, like me, regardless of your political colour or background, care about integrity and the reputation of the UK & NI in the world, please sign this and circulate it.
attributes.background: Considering the shambles we have witnessed for the past thousand days, I believe executive power should be handed back to the monarch to allow her to bring back order and direction to a thoroughly divided country.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what you mean by "the power".

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what powers you think should be held by the Monarch.
